text: split twice in the same expression?

code:
inFile = "/adda/adas/sdas/hello.txt"

# that instruction give me hello.txt
Name = inFile.name.split("/") [-1]

# that one give me the name I want - just hello
Name1 = Name.split(".") [0]

text: Is there any chance to simplify that doing the same job in just one expression?
